tasks.start: deno task build-gweb && deno task run
tasks.start-static-dev: deno task build-gweb && deno task run-static-dev
tasks.start-static: deno task build-gweb && deno task build-static && deno task run-static
tasks.run-static: cd "../Deno/Builds/WebApp_Default Web Server/" && deno run -A main.ts
tasks.build-gweb: "c:/Program Files/National Instruments/G Web Development Software/gwebcli.exe" build-application -p ../Deno/Deno.gwebproject -t "Default Web Server" -n WebApp.gcomp
tasks.publish: deno task build-gweb && deno task build-static && cd "../Deno/Builds/WebApp_Default Web Server/" && deployctl deploy ./main.ts
